amendment.description: Amendment restores $4.3 million in budget authority for the rural development loan fund program to continue direct loans to rural empowerment zones and 30 rural enterprise communities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 50 in the Congressional Record of July 18, 1995, to restore $7 million funds appropriated in the bill for direct loans from the Rural Development Loan Fund for empowerment zones and enterprise communities.The amendment would offset the increased funding by reducing the appropriation for administrative expenses under the Rural Housing Insurance Fund.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. de la Garza.

vote.text: On agreeing to the de la Garza amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
